'''Special Recipe Gift''' is an item obtained after reaching [[Tribe Reputation]] Level 4 with 6 tribes in [[Natlan]], alongside [[Special Furnishing Gift]].

Upon obtaining, it is automatically exchanged for the recipe for [[Cheesy Crab Hotpot]].
